name: Kinozal.tv Светлая тема v1.04
description:
Светлая тема оформления для сайта Kinozal.tv и Kinozal.me. 
Сужает сайт для больших экранов, чтобы было комфортнее читать.
Убраны блоки рекламы.
css: @-moz-document domain("kinozal.tv"), domain("kinozal.me"), domain("kinozal-tv.appspot.com") {* {outline:0;}.logo_new, .logo{background: #fff url(https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/517698907120209920/birornhb_400x400.png) no-repeat 0 22px;background-size: 75px;min-width:75px!important;padding:0 0 0 0!important;position:fixed;top:-23px}.logo_new img,.logo img{opacity:0;width:75px!important;height:90px!important;min-width:0!important}#header > table td[style="width:43%;"], #header .toper {position: fixed;z-index: 1001;width: 800px !important;left: 50%;margin-left:-400px}body, #header, #main, #footer {min-width: 750px}#main .content{min-width: 750px !important}#main .menu {padding: 0}#header .menu {width: 100%;height: 75px;position: fixed;top: 0;z-index: 1000;}#header .menu ul {position: absolute;top: 0;width: 620px;right: 50%;margin-right: -320px; }#header .menu form {background: rgba(255,255,255,0);width: 400px;height: 24px;border: 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.11) solid;border-radius: 3px;position: absolute;top: 23px;right: 50%;margin-right: -200px;padding: 8px 5px;}#header .menu form input.inp {font-weight: 900;width: 360px;padding-left: 5px;color: #333;height: 22px;border: 0;background: #ffffff !important;}#header .menu form .s_submit {background: url(http://slimshop.ru/images/search_bttn.png) no-repeat scroll left top transparent;height: 35px;width: 35px;margin-top: -5px;cursor: pointer;}#main .content > div {width: 99%}@media only screen and (min-width: 970px) {#main .content > div {width:750px;margin-right:-350px;}#main .content > form, #main .content > table {width: 755px}#main {left: 50%;margin-left:-480px;}}#main .content > .mn2_menu {margin-right: 0;display: inline-flex;float: inherit;}.w100p {width: auto;background: #fff!important}.mn1_content td a[href] img {-webkit-filter: hue-rotate(30deg);filter: hue-rotate(30deg);transition: 0.5s;}.mn1_content td a[href] img:hover {-webkit-filter: hue-rotate(0deg);filter: hue-rotate(0deg)}.tp1_but {-webkit-filter: hue-rotate(30deg);filter: hue-rotate(30deg);transition: 0.5s;}.tp1_but:hover {-webkit-filter: hue-rotate(0deg);filter: hue-rotate(0deg)}.bx2_0 {margin-bottom: 0;overflow: inherit;width: inherit;}.paginator {padding: 9px 0px 9px 12px;background: #fff;margin: 0}.paginator > ul {margin: auto;display: table;}#main a:link, #main a:visited {font-weight: normal;}}@-moz-document domain("kinozal.tv"), domain("kinozal.me"), domain("kinozal-tv.appspot.com") {body, #main{background-color: #eaeaea}#header {height: 75px;background: #ffffff;}#header .menu {box-shadow: 1px -3px 4px 3px rgba(0,0,0,0.35);background: #fff;}#header .menu ul li a {height: 18px !important;color: #616161}#header .menu ul li a:hover {background: #fff}.bx2_0, .bx2, .bx1_0, .mn_wrap, .tp1_border {background: #fff;border-radius: 2px;border: 0;margin-bottom: 0}.mn2,.bx1, .bx5x5 {background: #fff;border: 0}.mn1_content .bx2_0, .mn1_content .bx1_0{box-shadow: none;}ul.men li.center, .tp1_title {background-color: #fff;	font-size: 13px;font-weight: bolder;color: #546718;}.imgmn, .tp1_body { background: #fff}.bulet {background: #8eab2f}.paginator ul li a{border: 1px solid #8eab2f!important}.mn2, .bx5x5, .tp1_title {border-top: 1px solid #e6e6e6;margin-top: 15px}.bx1, .mn1_content .bx1_0 {border-left: 1px solid #8eab2f}.bx2_0 {border: 6px solid #ffffff}.u1, .u1 a, a.u1, a.u1:link, a.u1:active, a.u1:visited {color: #484646}tr:nth-of-type(2n) {background: #f3f3f3}.men li.tp, .mn {background-color: #e6e6e6!important}a.r1,a.r2,a.r5{display: block;box-shadow: 1px 1px 1px 0px #848383;border-radius: 1px}a.r0 {font-weight: 100!important;color: #4a4a4a!important;}a.r1 {font-weight: 100!important;color: #4a4a4a!important;background-color: rgba(255, 197, 0, 0.39)}a.r2 {font-weight: 100!important;color: #4a4a4a!important;background-color: rgba(226, 226, 226, 0.39)}a.r5 {font-weight: 100!important;color: #4a4a4a!important;background-color: rgba(230, 4, 4, 0.39)}#main .content > form {border: 4px solid #ffffff}input {outline: none;}input:-webkit-autofill {-webkit-box-shadow: inset 0 0 0 50px #fff !important; -webkit-text-fill-color: #999 !important; color: #999 !important; }}@-moz-document domain("kinozal.tv"), domain("kinozal.me"), domain("kinozal-tv.appspot.com") {#footer {display: none}#header .zan_l, #header .zan_r, .mgbox, .rb_new {display: none !important}}@-moz-document url("http://kinozal.tv/"), url("http://kinozal.me/"), url("http://kinozal.tv/radio.php"), url("http://kinozal.me/radio.php"), url("https://kinozal-tv.appspot.com/"), url("https://kinozal-tv.appspot.com/radio.php"), url-prefix("http://kinozal.tv/?page="), url-prefix("http://kinozal.me/?page="), url-prefix("https://kinozal-tv.appspot.com/?page=") {.pad0x0x5x0, .bx2_0 img, .tp1_icat{display: none}.mn2_menu > .bx2_0:first-child {display: none!important}.mn2_menu {padding: 0}.bx1 {margin-bottom: 0;border-top: 1px solid #e6e6e6;border-left: 0}.mn2, .bx5x5 {border-top: 0}.tp1_desc1 b, .tp1_desc3 b {width: 145px;display: inline-block}.tp1_title a, .tp1_title a:visited{font-weight: bold !important}.tp1_desc {margin-left: 171px}.tp1_img {width: 160px}tr:nth-of-type(2n) {background: #fff;}.w50 {display: inherit!important}.tp1_desc1 {-webkit-box-ordinal-group: 2;-moz-box-ordinal-group: 2;box-ordinal-group: 2;margin:0}.tp1_desc3 {-webkit-box-ordinal-group: 3;-moz-box-ordinal-group: 3;box-ordinal-group: 3}.tp1_desc {display: -webkit-box;display: -moz-box;display: box;-webkit-box-orient: vertical;-moz-box-orient: vertical;box-orient: vertical}}
